MajorClaims.MC1: I prefer to live in bigger cities than in small ones
MajorClaims.MC2: I prefer to live in a big city

Claims.C1: living in a dynamic environment can turn into a very rich experience that sharpens one's personality and open one's eyes on the real world
Claims.C2: the facilitates and services it contains which support and improve the quality of its inhabitants' lives, hospitals, advanced medical facilities can satisfy one's need of medical safety
Claims.C3: Cultural events such as exhibitions and theatre plays can enrich one's and widen his horizons, things which aren't offered by small towns
Claims.C4: big cities offer more opportunities for one's career advancements and a more chances of higher income that small towns does
Claims.C5: I would love to spend some days in countryside to recharge my soul and relieve myself from daily stress

Premises.P1: Life in big cities cities gives one new challenges every day, let it be deciding which restaurant to go to or deciding which company to work for
Premises.P2: For me, this lifestyles is very attractive and is considered a huge advantage of big cities compared with the constant, slow paced life styles of small towns
Premises.P3: higher income can be the basis of a happier, healthier life
Premises.P4: economic power of a country is driven by it's big cities and the majority of wealth and finance is centered and controlled in big cities
